0.dialouge: If I recall correctly,~ far far away...~ there exists a body of water stretching far beyond the eye can see.

1.dialouge:
It is said to be the origin of all life.~
Said to reach unimaginable depths.

2.dialouge: Though no one has seen it in person, it is theorized to be the origin of all life.

3.dialouge:
A lone boy lay flat on a drifting piece of wood, looking towards the sky.~
Gazing from one endless abyss to another.

4.dialouge:
I do not know how he got there and nor does it matter.~
He may as well have always been there.

5.dialouge: He's following a star, beneath which he knows he'll find his home.

6.dialouge:
Hey Hey Hey!~
Riiise and shiiine!

0.dialouge: It's time to get to work kids!

1.dialouge: Get yer asses up and meet me outside.
